name: FRANKLIN TEMPLETON INVESTMENTS
sampleDescriptions: H.R. 1, Bill to provide for reconciliation pursuant to titles II and V of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018 (bill formerly known as the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act).
Matters dealing with tax reform and international taxation.

Matters dealing with corporate and international taxation.
Matters dealing with corporate and international taxation and P.L. 119-21.
